text: Lucknawi, Lucknavi, Lakhnavi or Lakhnawi (Urdu: لکھنوی) is an Urdu surname that may refer to the following people: *Abd al-Hayy al-Lucknawi (1848–1886), Indian Islamic scholar *Munavvar Lakhnavi (1897–1970), Indian Urdu poet *Salik Lucknawi (1913–2013), pen name of the Indian Urdu poet and journalist Shaukat Riaz Kapoor Category:Urdu-language surnames
title: Lucknawi
